answers.answer: U could have preeclampsia id tell ur doctore right away
Or it's probably just normal ankle swelling.

Elevating your feet really helps, but if you are working behind a desk your ankles are going to get swollen! Don't worry about it too much, just try and elevate them as much as possible at work and when you get home, lay on your couch or bed and prop your feet up as high as you can and you will notice how quick the swelling goes down. The perks of being pregnant in summer - from a fellow sweller haha
Mines are the same way I woke up with tingling
Have your doctor check for low potassium.  It's really common in pregnancy and contributes to edema.

question: Last two days my ankles have swollen to twice thier size at work besides drinking lots of water through out the day and resting when I get home. What else should I do? Im 25 weeks, and sit in an office for work.
title: swollen ankles?
